title: Ep78: Blue Checkmark D-ck and Jerk Off Encouragement
itunes:title: Ep78: Blue Checkmark D-ck and Jerk Off Encouragement
description:
Long over due, the duo are guest-less this week as they catch you up on their sex lives after a rough therapy session that brought the two together. They catch you up on their vaginas and lives when Weezy announces finally getting some black peen in her life and Mandii is well...still just smashing 24/7. This week the conversation goes from a quick catch up to some ways to encourage your man to bust a nut. Have your pen and paper ready as we see who has the most kinky things left to do on their F-cket list. Want to join Mandii and Passport Cutty for a live session of hoe mail over drinks and paint? Get your tickets before it's too late here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/girls-night-out-paint-n-pour-w-mandii-and-passport-cutty-tickets-49723982771 Tickets include meet and greet, art supplies, open bar and a good ass time! Food will be available for purchase. Dates are September 29th & September 30th 6:30-8:30pm! Can't wait to see you all there! Follow us on Instagram @whoreible_decisions and don't forget to use the hashtag #WhoreibleDecisions and @Whoreiblepod on Twitter Follow Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and Weezy @WeezyWTF on Instagram to keep up with what the duo has going on!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
